text: it's mark Wiens here in Bangkok Thailand
and today I am hanging out with my buddy
Dwight Turner who is the founder of in
search of Sanuk which is a charity
organization here in Bangkok which helps
underprivileged families
Dwight's latest project is called
courageous kitchen where he along with
the help of some others provide cooking
classes to disadvantaged kids and teens
not only do the kids learn about
ingredients recipes and kitchen safety
but they also gain life skills like how
to make plans follow directions and
learn about proper nutrition it was also
pretty awesome to hear that they had
watched a few of my Thai recipe videos
on YouTube and had already made a couple
of the same dishes do I first gave them
some money and after planning out the
ingredients they needed we headed off to
the market to buy everything
when we got home the kids got straight
to work
some of them preparing a refreshing
watermelon passionfruit juice
and others began chopping up the chilies
and garlic and washing the basil for the
main dish it didn't take long for the
delicious aroma of stir-frying pork and
garlic to fill the room along with lots
of excitement and fun
it was great to see this group of kids
who all come from backgrounds of
disadvantaged families working together
as a team to prepare dinner building
their self-confidence and learning life
skills in the process Dwight is doing a
great job of helping make a difference
in their lives oh I think they did an
awesome job it's been an awesome hanging
out with the kids today and helping them
cook and also eating the food they've
cooked they also tried to imitate my
delicious food face but anyway Dwight is
doing some really awesome projects in
Bangkok and I fully support what he is
doing with the kids and with other
underprivileged families in Bangkok and
I would encourage you to get involved
maybe make a donation to one of his
projects even buy a meal for one of the
kids or for one of the families Dwight
is working with I'll leave all of the
information below this video and you can
click that link go check out what Dwight
is doing in Bangkok he's got some
awesome projects going on and he is
connecting food with people which I just
think is the greatest connection
ever so go check out his project now
he is connecting food with helping other
people which i think is the awesomest
coalition wait let me see
